title: American Report on Pan-African Conference MCQ 3

content.question: The authorâ€™s opinion in the third paragraph regarding the caution that the United States was employing in supporting African independence movements is most directly explained in the context of which of the following developments in the immediate aftermath of the Second World War?

choices.label: The United States had vastly more economic and military power than its European allies.
The United States and the Soviet Union preferred to engage in proxy wars rather than in direct conflict.
The United States used its influence in international organizations to rally support for its policies in Third World nations.
The United States used its intelligence agencies to overthrow regimes in Third World nations.

content.answer: The United States had vastly more economic and military power than its European allies.

topic.text: 8.1: Setting the Stage for the Cold War and Decolonization

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
